name: Marko John's for IG Socks
description:
IMAGE GRANTED MJs
 
Marko John's socks are made by a family-owned firm that has been making superior socks in England since 1895.

Marko John's and Image Granted have teamed up to create a bespoke pair of MJ's.  Using double-width stripes and a colour scheme of terracotta red and gold they are inspired by (and perfect for) fall.  Order now to avoid disappointment.  

Product available at Marko Johns.  Order here: 

 http://marko-johns.com/displayproduct.php?id=29&section=26
